fields.description: Follow-up from HIVE-6739. We cannot wait for Tez 0.4 (or even be sure that it will have TEZ-1004 and TEZ-1005), so I will split the patch into two. Original jira will have the straightforward (but less efficient) fix. This jira will use new relocalize APIs. -Depending on relative timing of Tez 0.4 release and Hive 0.13 release, this will go into 0.13 or 0.14- blocked on Tez 0.5
fields.summary: Hive HBase query fails on Tez due to missing jars - part 2

comments.body: Patch on top of HIVE-6739, when Tez ships new APIs I will update the version and this will be ready
